translations: n.[无化] 硼烷，[无化] 甲硼烷，硼氢化合物

phrs.translation: 硼烷, 硼氢化合物, 硼烷类

sentences.sentence: Boronyl provides an unexpected link between boron oxide clusters and boranes, allowing the design of new boron oxide clusters and boron boronyl complexes.
sentences.translation: 硼羰基作为硼氧化物与硼烷之间联系的桥梁，为设计新颖硼氧化物团簇和硼羰基复合物提供了理论和实验基础。

sentences.sentence: Pyridine can react with halogens, nitronium fluoroborate, sulfur trioxide, boranes and chromium trioxide to form some useful organic reagents which are introduced briefly in the paper.
sentences.translation: 吡啶可以和卤素、 硝基四氟化硼盐、 三氧化硫、 硼烷及三氧化铬反应，形成一些有用的有机试剂。
